level.heading: Duties and Responsibilities.
level.text: ยง 28-420.3 Duties and Responsibilities. The recipient of a safety registration number shall comply with the following requirements: 1. Subcontractor information. The recipient of a safety registration number shall maintain at each work site the names, business addresses and contact information of the superintendent(s) of the subcontractors who hold subcontracts with the prime contractor, as well as the particular work they perform, and shall make such information available to department personnel upon request; 2. Special inspection reports. The recipient of a safety registration number shall maintain at the work site such special inspection reports as specified in the building code and shall make such reports available to department personnel on request.
